create.description: Creates a sim with the specified age and name

delete.description: Deletes a sim by id or a legacy [-legacy] (legacy)

deselect.description: Deselects the currently selected sim, if there is one

help.description: Shows a list of available commands

load.description: Loads a legacy from a file

save.description: Saves the legacy to a file

select.description: Selects the specified sim to simplify some commands

settings.description: Toggles and shows the program settings.

stip.description: Adds a stipulation to a sim if they are old enough.

rle.description: Rolls a random life event for a non-specified sim

show.description: Shows who the specified sim is
